titles.title: BIG Data for IP Act

A bill to amend the Leahy-Smith America Invents Act to extend the period during which the Under Secretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director of the United States Patent and Trademark Office may set or adjust certain fees, and for other purposes.
BIG Data for IP Act
Building Innovation Growth through Data for Intellectual Property Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Building Innovation Growth through Data for Intellectual Property Act or the BIG Data for IP Act
This bill amends the Leahy-Smith America Invents Act to extend for 10 years the authority of the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to set and adjust patent fees.
